text: Sirajul Haque Montu is a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Barisal-6. ==Career== Montu was elected to parliament from Barisal-6 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1979. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:Living people Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sirajul Haque Montu
